title: Burmese chicken curry (gaeng gai bama)
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '8 shallots, thinly sliced', '450g skinless, boneless chicken, cut into large pieces', '2 tablespoons red curry paste', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '125ml coconut milk', '4 tablespoons tomato puree', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon palm sugar', '2 medium tomatoes, cut into wedges', '1 bunch coriander, chopped']
